sentence: Today,  that  real  and  immediate  threat  is  Hamas,  which  carried  out  the  Oct.  7  surprise  attack  on  Israel  that  killed  1,200  people.
Last  week  in  a  deadly  shooting  by  Hamas  militants  at  a  bus  stop  just  outside  Jerusalem,  three  people  were  killed  by  the  assailants.
A  fourth  man,  Yuval  Doron  Castleman,  was  also  killed  when  he  exited  a  vehicle  with  his  licensed  firearm  to  help  engage  the  gunmen.
Apparently  mistaken  for  one  of  the  attackers,  he  was  killed  by  soldiers.
